title: Dual touch issue to the bottom corner of the pixel 2xl phones. Its a harder glitch?
content:
I have installed the app name : multi touch test to check issue found dual touch doesn't respond to bottom corner of screen,
I noticed this issue while Playing pubg.

I request all the pixel 2xl users to install the app and check and we must report to google to get it fixed.

I had sent for repair 4times but issue couldn't be resolved by Google
